title: How to split my physical screen into two logical screens in windows 10 so that applications see two screens - Quora

response.answer_text: Interesting question. Cannot answer this. But try this and reply back. In the control panel add a new device, and use “Have Disk” to add a TV . Generally monitor have multiple source connectors, use two such source like VGA + HDMI Now play with it. It may work. Best of luck, and reply back
